definition: to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: If you visit her too often, she thinks it's boring.
sentences.chinese: 如果你找她太频繁，她会觉得烦腻。

sentences.english: If you visit her too often , she thinks it is boring.
sentences.chinese: 如果你经常去找她，她会觉得烦腻。

sentences.english: If you visit her too often , she thinks it is boring .
sentences.chinese: 如果你太常去找她，她会觉得烦腻。

sentences.english: After years of marriage, it’s normal to feel jaded in the relationship every now and then.
sentences.chinese: 结婚多年，时不时会对彼此感到烦腻，这也是难免的。

definition: bored/to be fed up with/sick and tired of sth
to be weary of/to be fed up with/tedious
tired of/fed up/sick/(of a person) to annoy/tiresome
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
lit. dazzling with paper and gold (idiom); fig. indulging in a life of luxury
